title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, Appendices, app 47
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, Appendices, app 47

State Regulations

Health-Based Limits for Exclusion of Waste-Derived

Residues

Appendix VII to 40 CFR part
266, as of July 1, 2002, is
incorporated by reference as if fully set forth herein (see section
370.1
[e]
of this

Title). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, Appendices, app
47

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
